item.title: CVE-2021-24515|2024-08-03T19:35:20.135Z -- unknown -- video%20gallery%20-%20vimeo%20and%20youtube%20gallery
item.description: The Video Gallery WordPress plugin before 1.1.5 does not escape the Title and Description of the videos in a gallery before outputting them in attributes, leading to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues
